import React from 'react' import '../cart/cart.scss' import Count from '../count/Count' import DeleteBtn from '../deleteBtn/deleteBtn' const Cart = ({tovar, deleteProduct, increase, changeValue, decrease}) => { const {img, title, priceTotal, count, id} = tovar; const priceFormater = new Intl.NumberFormat() return (
{title}
{priceFormater.format(priceTotal)} руб.
) } export default Cart
